DOC.brief_summary: Basal Cell Carcinoma ( BCC ) common malignant growth world . Treatment primarily surgical goal excise growth entirety . When pathology result show achieved , re-excision routinely perform . This study examine retrospectively percentage re-excisions BCC actually prove positive ( exhibited growth ) among re-excisions perform Rambam Healthcare Campus Zvulun Community Medical Center year 2008-10 .
DOC.brief_title: Rates Positive Basal Cell Carcinomas ( BCCs ) Re-excisions
DOC.criteria: All patient underwent incomplete BCC excision year 20082010 . Patients underwent incomplete BCC excision subsequently refer undergo MOHS procedure .
